stories.title: Select Value from Dropdown
stories.description: As a user, I want to select a value from a dropdown so that I can choose the desired option.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When I click the dropdown under 'Select Value', Then a list of options including 'Select Option' should be visible.
Given the dropdown is expanded, When I select an option, Then the selected option should be displayed in the 'Select Value' field.

stories.title: Select One from Title Dropdown
stories.description: As a user, I want to select a title from the dropdown so that I can confirm my selection.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When I click the dropdown under 'Select One', Then a list of options including 'Select Title' should be visible.
Given a title is selected, When the dropdown is collapsed, Then the selected title should be shown in the 'Select One' field.

stories.title: Old Style Select Menu Interaction
stories.description: As a user, I want to interact with the old style select menu so that I can pick an option.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the select menu is displayed, When I click on it, Then a dropdown with options like 'Red' should be displayed.
Given an option is selected, When I view the select menu, Then the chosen option should be visible in the dropdown.

stories.title: Multiselect Dropdown Interaction
stories.description: As a user, I want to choose multiple options from a multi-select dropdown so that I can apply multiple selections.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the page is loaded, When I click the dropdown under 'Multiselect drop down', Then the dropdown should allow multiple selections.
Given options are selected, When I collapse the dropdown, Then the selected options should be listed in the 'Multiselect drop down' field.

stories.title: Standard Multi Select Interaction
stories.description: As a user, I want to select multiple items from a standard multi-select box so that I can choose various options.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the multi-select box is displayed, When I select options like 'Volvo', 'Saab', Then these options should be highlighted and selectable.
Given multiple selections are made, When I review the multi-select list, Then all selected items should remain highlighted.
